dcterms:description: A Chinese Mandarin pop songs dataset containing 117 songs (total ∼5.89 hours with lyrics) collected from a qualified female vocalist, recorded in a studio. The dataset includes phoneme-level alignments and pitch information extracted from the raw waveform.
dcterms:title: PopCS

dcterms:creator: K. Ito
L. Johnson
dcterms:description: The LJSpeech dataset contains 13,100 English audio clips (total ∼24 hours) with corresponding transcripts, designed for text-to-speech tasks.
dcterms:title: LJSpeech
